constituent: face, lad, vase, stand up, cliff, shape, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: A lad's head still has a baby's face.
koohiiStory2: When I was a lad, a pretty face was all it took for someone to get in my head, and I´d fill pages of lovelorn letters to them.
